name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Cook the rice and set aside.
In a pan, cook the diced chicken until browned.
Add chopped onion, carrot, and mushroom to the pan and stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
Push the ingredients to one side of the pan and scramble the egg on the other side.
Mix everything together and add cooked rice.
Pour in soy sauce and stir until everything is well combined.
